name: BTD, AI Generated Art Puzzle
description:
Hello guys,

This is my very short AI-Generated Art puzzle demo.

The Girl was in her dream and saw something eerie. 

Explore the dream before she was sent to somewhere unknown...

I wanted to experiment with the possibilities of ai art in game development. 

Play By Holding and Dragging Things onto each other.

Objects can interact multiple times for more information.

Please tell me what you guys think!
